(Simplified: 阃)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 困 indicates the sound; 門 (gate) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿵ Surround from above
    • 門 [ mén ] gate, door, entrance, opening
    • 困 [ kùn ] to surround; to besiege; surrounded, in distress; poor; tired, sleepy
①門檻，門限：“送迎不越閫”。
②特指城郭的門檻：“閫以內者寡人制之，閫以外者將軍制之”。閫外。
③統兵在外的將軍：“即具以北虛實告東西二閫”。閫職。
④內室，借指婦女：閫闈。閫奧。閫德(借指婦德)。閫範。
閫奧 [ kǔn ào ]: innermost room; (fig.) heart
閫寄 [ kǔn jì ]: military command
閫範 [ kǔn fàn ]: model of feminine virtues

閫字的基本解释

閫
kǔn
见“阃”。

閫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kǔn］
［《廣韻》苦本切，上混，溪。］
“阃1”的繁体字。亦作“閸1”。
(1)门槛。
(2)指郭门。
(3)借指将帅或大臣。
(4)借指军事或政务。
(5)古时地方上将帅的官衙。
(6)古代妇女居住的内室。
(7)借指妻室。
(8)泛指妇女。
(9)比喻学问、事理的精深之处。
(10)宫中的道路。

閫字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閫； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1335第12
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?苦本切，音悃。【廣韻】門限也。【集韻】門橛也。【史記·馮唐傳】閫以內者，寡人制之。【註】此郭門之閫也，門中橛曰閫。【儀禮·士冠禮·布席於門中闑西閾外註】閾，閫也。【易·師卦註】閫外之事，將軍所裁，臨事制宜，不必皆依君命。　又天閫。【前漢·揚雄傳】天閫決兮地垠開。【註】天閫，天門之閫也。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?苦悶切，音困。義同。　【集韻】本作梱。

Lonely
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kǔn］
["Guangyun" bitter original cut, upmix, creek. ]
"阃1" in traditional characters. Also known as "閸1".
(1) Threshold.
(2) Refers to Guomen.
(3) By means of generals or ministers.
(4) It refers to military or government affairs.
(5) The official offices of local generals in ancient times.
(6) The inner room where ancient women lived.
(7) By referring to the wife's room.
(8) Refers to women in general.
(9) Metaphorical knowledge and the depth of affair.
(10) The road in the palace.
Lonely
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集上】【Menzi Department】　阃; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1335 Page 12
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Positive Rhyme]? Hard to cut the original, the sound is terrible. [Guangyun] The threshold is also. [Ji Yun] The door prongs are also. 【Historical Records·Feng Tang Biography】Those who are within the range of one's length are under the rule of widowhood. [Note] This is the gate of Guo gate, and the prong in the gate is called gate. [Ritual Ceremony·Shiguan Ceremony·Buxi Yumen Zhongqianxi threshold outside note] threshold, Yan Ye. 【Notes of Yi·Shi Gua】For things outside the rule of law, the general will lay off them, and they do not need to follow the emperor’s orders.　It's another day. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong's Biography] The sky is determined to open. [Note] Tianzhen, the gate of Tianya.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Distressed cut, sound sleepy. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】This is a song.
